item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Just thinking with our days lasting longer and my being out of pocket most weekends till either the 1st or second week in September that some of you might be open to an evening hike or two.

How does a quick hike up and down the red loop this Monday at 6:30 sound to you? The loop is fun up the hill and then down we can easily do the loop in 45 minutes, 30 if we hurry, or an hour if we are walking at a slow pace.

I'll Be the brunette at the ski lodge parking lot in the white vintage, old, audi with my cute puff of a bichon Breezy ...

Looking for directions - Here are the ones I grabbed of bluehillsski.com

Take I-93 South / US-1 South.
Take Exit 2B / Milton onto MA-138 North / Washington St.
Blue Hills Ski Area is approximately 1 mile on the right.

From the Cape: Take MA-3 North towards Boston.
Take Exit 20 on the left onto I-93 South / US-1 (toward I-95 / Dedham).
Take Exit 2B / Milton onto MA-138 North / Washington St.
Blue Hills Ski Area is approximately 1 mile on the right.

From Providence: Take I-95 North (Crossing into Massachusetts).
Take Exit 12 towards Boston (I-93 North / US-1 North).
Take Exit 2B / Milton onto MA-138 North / Washington St.
Blue Hills Ski Area is approximately 1 mile on the right.

Hope to see you there!

Chat soon,

Kristan
item.how_to_find_us: I'll Be the brunette at the ski lodge parking lot in the white vintage, old, audi with my cute puff of a bichon Breezy ...
item.name: Evening Hike @ Blue Hills
